short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display a quote from Satoshi Nakamoto on every new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension shows users a random quote from Satoshi Nakamoto when opening a new tab. The quote is displayed on a clean background that is easy to read with built in accessibility features such as a slider to change font size - font size is saved and automatically used when opening another tab and a button to allow the quote to be read back to the user. 

Users should install this extension for a fun, professional looking background when opening new tabs in their browser.
